Q:
Our company has 5 computers connected by several communication links. These computers are named: Server Oceanview, Server Seabreeze, Server Silverhawk, Server Sunflower and Server Silverstone. 
To ensure network security, we need to install monitoring devices (such as firewalls or intrusion detection systems) on some of these computers so that all communication links are monitored. 
Assume that the connections between the computers (i.e., the communication links) are bidirectional. This means that information can flow in both directions across any link. Our goal is to deploy monitoring devices in a way that ensures all communication links are covered by at least one monitoring device. 
Problem: How can we select the minimum number of computers to deploy monitoring devices, such that every communication link is monitored by at least one device? 
Communication links as follows: : 
Server Oceanview is connected with Server Seabreeze, Server Sunflower, Server Silverstone. 
Server Seabreeze is connected with Server Silverstone. 
Server Silverhawk is connected with Server Sunflower.

Problem: How can we select the minimum number of computers to deploy monitoring devices, such that every communication link is monitored by at least one device? 
Communication links as follows: : 
Server Blackwood is connected with Server Seabreeze, Server Twilight, Server Falconeye. 
Server Twilight is connected with Server Moonlight. 
Server Moonlight is connected with Server Falconeye.

Assume that the connections between the computers (i.e., the communication links) are bidirectional. This means that information can flow in both directions across any link. Our goal is to deploy monitoring devices in a way that ensures all communication links are covered by at least one monitoring device. 
Problem: How can we select the minimum number of computers to deploy monitoring devices, such that every communication link is monitored by at least one device? 
Communication links as follows: : 
Server Moonlight is connected with Server Silverhawk, Server Windmill. 
Server Windswept is connected with Server Silverhawk, Server Willowbrook. 
Server Willowbrook is connected with Server Windmill.
